TEXT.TITLE: JAPAN HIGHWAY CORP PLANS TO ISSUE ECU BOND
TEXT.BODY: Japan Highway Public Corp planned to issue a seven-year government-guaranteed 120 mln European currency unit (ecu) bond with coupon at 7.375 pct late this month, a corporation spokeman told Reuters. Issue price would be 101.125 pct to yield 7.165 pct. Lead manager was Bank of Tokyo Capital Market Ltd, a subsidiary of the Bank of Tokyo in Britain and co-lead manager Credit Commercial de France, he added. He declined to give other details. REUTER
